channel.title: Error message: "failed to create D3D device!"
channel.description: DLed and installed via mirrors, launched, and then - "failed to create D3D device! Refer to forum...." pops up. Has anyone encountered this, and do any of the dev team know what that refers to? Thanks, can't wait to get past this slight hurdle and play the game.

item.title: Error message: "failed to create D3D device!"
item.dc:creator: Combine
item.description:
DLed and installed via mirrors, launched, and then - “failed to create D3D device! Refer to forum…” pops up. Has anyone encountered this, and do any of the dev team know what that refers to? Thanks, can’t wait to get past this slight hurdle and play the game.

Read full topic
